casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Flint Fitzgerald JOHNSON, Jr. 382P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Flint Fitzgerald Johnson, Jr., for Johnson, Flint Fitzgerald (Jr.). Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of October 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019." Ervin, J. recused
